How do I activate M$ Office 2013 via Phone Method? Can anyone explain me the process of Phone Method ? How Do I do it ?

How do I activate M$ Office 2013 via Phone Method? Can anyone explain me the process of Phone Method ? How Do I do it ?

How do I activate M$ Office 2013 via Phone Method? Can anyone explain me the process of Phone Method ? How Do I do it ???

Open Word -> File -> Account -> Product Activation -> Phone Activation (on upside down left) -> Enter Serial -> Make a phone call to your region and take your activation code.

If you enter an invalid serial key go to Start -> Control Panel -> Programs -> Uninstall or change a program -> Microsoft Office Professional Plus 2013 -> Change -> Enter new serial key.

Good Luck!
